bibl.title: Papyrus Oxyrhynchus X 1224.

series.title: Texts and Editions for New Testament Study.

bibl.title: Early Christian Manuscripts. Examples of Applied Method and Research.

bibl.seg: Thomas J. Kraus and Tobias Nicklas (Edd.), Early Christian Manuscripts. Examples of Applied Method and Research = Texts and Editions for New Testament Study. 5 (Leiden, 2010) pp. 59-96, 8 figg.
